name: cni-ss-qt1
label: CNI Slice-Shuffled qT1 Mapping
description: T1 fitting tool for data acquired with the slice-shuffled SMS IR-EPI sequence from CNI.

nifti.description: NIFTI file from the qT1 scan

nifti_rpe.description: NIFTI file from the reverse phase encoding qT1 scan

nifti_B0map.description: NIFTI file from the B0 map scan (2D Fast GRE)

TI.description: Shortest TI of the slice-shuffled scan in ms. Use the config value unless cannot be derived from the nifti metadata

TR.description: TR of the slice-shuffled scan in ms. Use the config value unless cannot be derived from the nifti metadata

calibration_cycle.description: Number of calibration cycles at the beginning of data acquisition. Use the config value unless cannot be derived from the nifti metadata

calibration_volume.description: Number of calibration volumes at the beginning of the NIFTI file. Use the config value unless cannot be derived from the nifti metadata

use_B0map.description: Use B0 map for EPI distortion correction (instead of using the reverse phase encoding nifti)

unwarp_direction.description: Direction of the EPI distortion correction. The definition is as follows: phase encoding (PE) direction = A/P, PE polarity = 0 (pe0), then unwarp_direction = y; PE direction = A/P, PE polarity = 1 (pe1), then unwarp_direction = y- (default); PE direction = R/L, PE polarity = 0, then unwarp_direction = x; PE direction = R/L, PE polarity = 1, then unwarp_direction = x-

descending_slices.description: Descending or ascending slice acquisition. Use the config value unless cannot be derived from the nifti metadata

esp.description: Effective echo spacing in seconds. Use the config value unless cannot be derived from the nifti metadata

mask_threshold.description: Fractional intensity threshold (0->1); smaller values give larger brain outline estimates

multiband_factor.description: Multiband factor of the slice-shuffled scan

topup_method.description: Algorithm used for applytopup. 'jac' for Jacobian, 'lsr' for least-square resampling

author: Hua Wu
